This game is garbage, absolutely hate 99% of the time.....

Mit jedem Update wird das Spiel schlimmer und schlimmer. 
Man merkt richtig wie das Spiel immer mehr für Tryhards und Noobs angepasst wird. Das Komplette Balancing wird einfach nur noch für Leute mit Rang 20 und 10h Spielzeit angepasst. 

Offensichtliche Bugs dauern ewig bis die fixed werden, und nochmal ewig bis diese wirklich fixed sind. Ganz zu schweigen von den vielen Hacks die Möglich sind und seit Ewigkeiten ungefixt sind. Einfach mal über die komplette Map in 2 Sekunden laufen? Mit Hacks in DBD Möglich. Nie vom Killer getroffen werden mit Fake Bad-Ping? Jup geht auch. 
Als Europäer auf Server die Gefühlt in Sibirien stehen verschoben werden, wo man dann absolut schlechte Ping hat? Jupp DBD halt. 
Erst Groß Resident-Evil Chapter ankündigen und dann nach wenigen Stunden die Resident-Evil Police Station Map deaktivieren müssen, weil man kein ordentliches Test Team hat. Jupp, DBD. 
Und jetzt versuchen sie sich das Matchmaking noch mehr zu verschlechtert, in dem das Rang basierte System entfernt werden soll. Damit die Noobs die lieber mit Barbie und Bauklötzchen spielen sollten, weil Sie weder Skills noch Durchhaltevermögen haben, noch die Bereitschaft sich intensiver mit der Game Mechanik auseinander zusetzen mehr Erfolgserlebnisse haben.  

DBD ist zu einem Spiel verkommen für Tryhards und Leute die sonst nur Candyrush zocken. 

Für Spieler Ü30 die in einem Game noch echte Langzeit Herausforderung suchen, ist dieses Spiel absolut nicht mehr zu empfehlen.

на дворе 16 год.Компания Bhvr никому не была известна.И дбд уже почти доделана и вот она вышла.Все такие,о,дбд хорор игра.(каз коммьюнити 99/трайхард ради победы 1%))(44hrs<3)А потом разрабы захотели больше людей.И начали делать каллабы которые взорвут,ради людей.Люди зашли игра начала набирать обороты И вот,начиная с 20 года, начали делать маньяков просто ради того,чтоб оставить людей в их детище.На мнение игроков всем поебать.Нерфим все что нерфится и бафаем тех кого никто не пикает.Да они занерфили нюрсу и билли.Да типо апнули клоуна.А про рин они ее никак не занерфят,без убийства ее абилки.Мне кажется что просто раньше была агония в глазах BHVR,как бы не остатся с хуем во рту и раньше были идеи и вот в дбд пришел такой сэд момент когда даже сами разрабы поняли,что так дело не пойдет,мы выжили весь сок из себя и такие тип давайте работать с тем что у нас есть и подкидывать на отьебись новый уонтент!взять тот же ракун,на котором если ты маньяк у тя преимущество ибо ты видишь гены а сурвы нет;(.Разрабы просто пытаются держаться  на строю и у них это получается судя по евридей онлайну в 60к.А на соревновательную сторону дбд как забивали так и забивают.Логика разрабов изменим-ка мы визуализацию единицы на красном фоне в правом верхнем углу и все.Не переработаем идею получения ранга.А вот Саньку который всю неделю пахал на зарплату в 20к на которую он купил банку пиваса и зашел вечерком в 'хорор' игру(кринжово дбд называть хорором)

Addition: So BEhavior have officially announced that SBMM is officially going live along with the new killer DLC on September 7th so... The game is dead to me and my friends. They have completely ignored their playerbase and are going through with probably what is the worst mistake they can make right now. I honestly feel a little disgusted with myself that I have spent so much time and money on the game only to wind up not playing it any longer. I really wish I had seen this coming otherwise I would have never bought the game to begin with. Fuck BEhavior, fuck this game, fuck the toxic players.

So apparently the devs have been trying to force Skill Based Match Making into the game for a while and have since enabled and disabled it a few times and have recently re-enabled it. Basically, it SUCKS. I bought the game during the summer sale and have played plenty of both killer and survivor and mostly enjoying myself until the moment they implemented SBMM. This game has no ranked mode, so why the HELL is there SBMM? 

Do they think that being put against a Huntress with end game ultra meta perk builds, red and green skill attachments, paid skin and a red Mori  FOUR TIMES IN A ROW is fun?! Spoiler alert: It fecking isn't! Ok sure this tells me I do ok with survivor that warrants putting me in a match with a skilled player, but this is not fun in the slightest. Yes sometimes we want to go against a fairly new killer, not to bully them but to have a laid back moment, show them what experienced survivors can do so they can learn and adapt around it. Or be with newer survivors to do the same with them, help them learn and let them enjoy the game so they don't quit playing altogether thinking the game was trash because the SBMM system is trash.

The same applies to killer, when across three matches 10/12 survivors all used Dead Hard/Decisive Strike or (most of the time) both because they are seen as the "meta" perks. The game loses ALL of it's variety and removes a massive chunk of the reason to play when every single match plays the same. The moment you begin to do well, you get matched with people better than you, when you loose you go against people below you, you win and it repeats. 

I have poured hours upon hours into watching videos on the game and actually playing in hopes of getting better and enjoying myself or even just having fun with friends. But now, I frankly don't want to play the game anymore. Neither me nor any of my friends think SBMM is good in any way shape or form, I know the community is pissed off as well. All the streamers and content creators I watch say the same thing, the devs are poisoning the game by refusing to listen to the community. I haven't even been part of the community an entire month but I can see a clear difference in the game in a matter of two days. I WANT to enjoy the game and keep playing I genuinely do but I also don't want to force myself to play the game when I'm not enjoying it anymore. Supposedly the next killer will be part of the coming PTB in five days but I quickly stopped caring, I'm not spending another dime on the game until they turn off SBMM (again) or maybe not even playing it until then.

Behavior is garbage, they continue to update the game and make you freeze while vaulting, and then they give you an error message saying you "lost connection" ban you from playing for 5 minutes and derank you twice, this game has been out for years, Behavior is not doing a good job so far as they like to say.

[i] Quick note: this review is mostly from a survivor main's perspective. I have not played that much killer, so I can't really speak to that side of the game, but I think most of what I talk about is applicable to the game in general, and not just one part of it. [/i]

After playing Dead by Daylight for over 150 hours at this point, I think I'm finally at least somewhat qualified to talk about whether this game is a good purchase or not (some might disagree with me, but oh well). In short: this game, in its current state, is not good. 

This game, in fact, is so fundamentally broken in every way that I've basically given up on the game at this point. What started as me enjoying DbD immensely and playing it very often has now turned into me dreading launching the game every time I try to play it. I have tried so, so very hard to enjoy this game and love it for what it is, but, in the end, the devs obviously don't care about the game, and so neither will I.

To keep this review relatively short, I'm going to talk about the main two problems with the game that are the most damaging and important: the lack of competition and devs that don't care, and a game that is broken at its very core.

First, let's talk about the fact that, as my friend says, this game has literally zero competition. What that leads to is the devs not giving a shit about fixing the game. If you want to play a game like this, then your only choice really is to play DbD. Sure, you could argue that I could just "go play Friday the 13th" (or Civ 5 according to the lead developer of DbD), but for various reasons that's not really a good counter-argument. 

So, what happens when there's no competition and there are devs that are too lazy to fix the game? Two things. First, the devs like to placate the playerbase by occasionally having events and making skins and fixing textures, etc. Yes, they do occasionally update textures, like character models and generators, but only after literal years of them looking awful. Then, they'll have an event where they add a bunch of skins and such, and have "funny" quotes about how much they love the game and their playerbase, which is obvious B.S.

What I'm saying is the devs use things like what I just mentioned to keep the playerbase happy while they don't bother to fix the actual problems with the game, the most obvious of which is the servers, which ties into my second point.

Where the hell do I even start with how bad the net code in this game is? I think that if you're a killer main you probably don't mind how shit they are, because it benefits you, but if you're anyone else who has played DbD you know exactly what I'm talking about. All you need to do to find out how fundamentally broken the net code is in this game is to just look up YouTube videos of people getting hit from basically miles away, killers ignoring pallet stuns, lunges that make the killer hit you out of nowhere, and SO MUCH LAG. Not to mention all the salty-ass killers in this game who intentionally exploit the game's problems to make the game even less fun, but that's a whole other discussion.

[b] So, TL;DR: Until Behavior fixes the central problems of DbD and stops being lazy about fixing the game, do not buy this game. I didn't even mention all of the other problems with this game, like how stupidly terrible the grind is, how toxic the community can be, and how agonizingly frustrating playing one match of it can be. Save your 20 bucks (minimum) and go buy a better game, just like Behavior told you to do. [/b]

有一说一的确是开创了新游戏玩法，可是匹配机制和服务器可以说是我玩过所有里面数一数二差的，我可以说是前所未见，就打个比方你是白银屠夫可以匹配到峡谷之巅的人类，可以说一整把都在被人类嘲讽，我反正劝所以想入坑的玩家先去育碧或者烂橘子的服务器把自己心态练好了，再去网上看会儿视频再来玩。而且国服人很少，外网延迟高。并不推荐新手玩家入坑。
